h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Next, head past the stairs to continue along the cell tunnel to find a dead end with one more Blade Monk guarding a **Treasure Chest** with assorted materials inside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
Next, head past the stairs to continue along the cell tunnel to find a dead end with one more Blade Monk guarding a **Treasure Chest** with assorted materials inside.
